Title: Fog Tags
Description:
While I analyze these fog samples, I have another task for you.

My employers have asked me to figure out where these fog beasts are coming from. I've developed these trackers. If you could, please attach them to an assortment of fog beasts.   

You'll have to get close, so... be careful. Hopefully they don't mind it too much!
ObjectivesText: Attach trackers to fog beasts in and around Taelloch.
CompletionText: Have you attached all the trackers?
RewardText: You've attached the trackers? Perfect! Did they attack you? No? Interesting... This is all so interesting...
